summary: In this animated prequel to Van Helsing (2004), Van Helsing travels to Victorian London to catch the mysterious, inhuman serial killer, Mr. Hyde.
cast: Hugh Jackman|Robbie Coltrane|David Wenham|Grey Griffin|Dwight Schultz|John DiMaggio|Scott Mosenson|Alun Armstrong|Roger Jackson|Julia Fletcher|Tress MacNeille|Tara Strong|James Arnold Taylor
keywords: twisted love|queen victoria character|reference to jack the ripper|hulking out|magical potion
title: Van Helsing: Misión en Londres
